channel.title: Complaints about staff & Suggestions to help improve the site
channel.description: Yes I'm aware that Lothy And Miss Silabsoft have removed them, I couldn't care less. This is mostly aimed at the moderators, Who removed them. By removing those topics don't you feel that "you cut your nose of to spite your face?" They were there, even though they wern't used for there correct purposes. They did keep the worthless crap out of General discussion to a certain degree. They also gave us a chance to have heated discussions that normally anywhere else wouldn't be alowed. Could you maybe concider Bringing them back?

item.title: Complaints about staff & Suggestions to help improve the site
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

For any real suggestion or complaint pm a staff member. don’t create a topic about it we don’t need you making a mess of the general section. If the complaint is about a moderator send it to a different moderator or send it directly to moparisthebest.

As for the RSC section report the posts and a RSC moderator or global moderator will view the report in the report section.

Read full topic
item.source: Complaints about staff & Suggestions to help improve the site

item.title: Complaints about staff & Suggestions to help improve the site
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Basically the staff decided that if the actual suggestion is worth considering the member can simple use the general section to create a new topic about it.

The old stickies had some very decent suggestions and valid complaints but really both topics comprised of spam and flame by people that were not even involved with an issue.

We (as a moderating team) definitely payed close attention to every single post made in the old stickies and now with seperate topics it’ll make it even easier. Plus seperate topics should stop suggestions digressing.

Read full topic
item.source: Complaints about staff & Suggestions to help improve the site

item.title: Complaints about staff & Suggestions to help improve the site
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:2, topic:361223"]It would be a waste of time bringing it back, it’s already gone, and half of the decent suggestions are understandable complaints were just ignored by them anyway.

It’s better off being gone.

Oh btw, i suggest the new moderators do some fucking moderating besides the RSC section.[/quote]

Oh talking of that, Could i suggest we have a Topic for talking about utter random shit?

Read full topic
item.source: Complaints about staff & Suggestions to help improve the site
